reviewText:
case closed is a perfect anime that keeps you guessing and keeps you wanting soo much more! Jimmy a 17yr olg high school student was shrunk down to a kid and took the name conan after the auther of the sherlock holmes series.. conan (jimmy) is a brilliant detective and figures out every crime and murder he runs into... if anyone knows I was just wondering, i already own case closed season 4 but it is a different cover than this one. is it the same epsiodes???
case closed is a must buy!!! amazon plzzzz keep them coming soon  season 6 soon??
I like this series. Love how Conan (aka Jimmy)solves the cases and tells how it was done.

I enjoy this item because I like the cartoons.  I used to watch this on regular TV but when it was discontinued, I started purchasing these episodes.  They are very good and as long as they available on sale, I will be purchasing them.  I recently placed an order for the Sason Five episodes.  I am looking forward to them.

Our whole family loves the Case Closed series. This was a great set because there were many episodes that we did not get to see before. Each time, the first time through, it's always exciting to try and guess the outcome. Some of these had me stumped and my sons too. This was a birthday present for my younger son Brad; Good Pick! We're ready for Season 5!

I just got the set two days ago and each episode was great.  Conan was shown as the tone deaf person he really is and the cases were as good as their manga counterparts, but I was disappointed by the misleading label.  In the past, FUNimation has always listed episode that were one-hour long as separate episodes and played it all the way through with no breaks, when you viewed the episode (Moonlight Sonata Murder Case, Mist Goblin, and Phantom Thief 1412, as examples of what they did in earlier releases).  However, with this set they took a two-hour long episode and literally separated it into four episodes.  It obvious that it was supposed to be 2-hours because they show scenes from the entire episode each of the four times the opening came up.  Now, this does not mean that I will not continue supporting the U.S. release of the show, but I feel cheated that they did this, when the box says "unedited/uncut".  I'll continue supporting the U.S. release and recommending it to others, hoping that FUNimation does not do this again in the future.

Season 4 includes episodes that never aired in the USA. I am looking forward to the March release of season 5. This is just a great traditional amine that has mystery's for all ages. This series is 500+ episodes strong and still going in japan and i hope they will continue to release them on DVD in the USA.
I was. Worried. It would. Have. Subtitles. But it was in English and the quality was perfect. It was still. In the plastic. Wrap
Love all Case Closed episodes. Just wish they were all in English so I can see them all. The subtitles to me take away from watching the episode itself and I don't want to miss anything.

In the four season of Case Closed. Detective Conan has done it again and solved all his cases. The clues for the Black Organization are slims to none from fixing his kid size problem. Conan powers though each case hoping to find some clues to problem at hand. Now that Harley Hartwell knows Conan secret, he think at Conan should tell Richard and  Rachel about it. But Conan think its better to keep them in the dark about it. Conan is now apart of the junior detective league which solved some of the case that don't go to Richard. So can Conan track down any clues in cases that lay before him or is he doom to be a kid until he grows up naturally.
Remember "Only One Truth Prevails."

Coming Soon Case Closed Season Five Review

I bought this for my daughter for Christmas; she's a huge Case Closed fan.

She loved it, so I loved it. She says, "It was tremendous. The mysteries gave me a shiver of scares and excitement.":-)

This season is no exception to the level of quality this fantastic series has built a reputation around.  Unfortunately, the English dub of Case Closed may very well be over with as Funimation is ceasing production. Spread the word of Case Closed! Buy the DVDs (possibly even as a gift), buy the manga, tell friends about it, and most importantly, stop uploading the episodes to YouTube (provided you are one who does so, if not, still refrain).  Regardless, this show deserves your attention and time -- the originality of episodes, blend of action and humor, and (surprisingly) strong soundtrack.  If there is one thing you can take away from this review, it's this:

SAVE CASE CLOSED!

Case Closed is one of my favorite tv shows. I love how it takes me on a journey to discover Whodunit! This season does not disappoint. Be sure to add it to your collection of Conan Edagawa's adventures!

I was originally upset because I did not want the Veridian set. I had the box sets for every other season and I wanted the cover art for the original set. The only set available right now is the Veridian. Despite the cover art  and case the set is the same. It was a very enjoyable series and was shipped right away. It is very nice. I would recommend it for anyone who likes mystery or anime. Conan reminds me of a little Sherlock Holmes and his adventures with Rachel and his friends are very fun, exciting, and leave you at the edge of your seat.

Love, love, LOVE this set!

The quality is nice & I love the series to death.

Although I did hope for extras. Can't have it all. I'll be ordering Season 5 shortly. :D

I just received this today, and I was so excited to start watching it. I took me about 11 hours to watch all of it, and let me say that it was totally worth every second. But one thing that bothered me is that this season didn't seem to have the same exciting moments the first 3 seasons had. Don't get me wrong, the season is great, its just lacking the same zing that kept you on the edge of your seat. I found myself getting on the computer a few times, and just listening to show rather than watch it, but I was still able to follow what was happening.

I now have to get the 5th season so I can spend another day dedicated to Case Closed. If your a fan of the show, then you should definately buy this season.

Case closed(detective conan) is in english. This is season four. I own all 5 seasons available in the USA that are all in english.  It is a WONDERFUL series! It is action, adventure, love, mystery, murder all in one. For any case closed fan or anime fan or mystery fan!! I am looking forward in Funimation making more. There are 18 seasons total in Japan.
Great

Great anime, wished they ENG DUB the entire series (after 4/5 there is no more ENG DUB and is only jap plus good luck finding it on youtube/other sites) Ive tried. Discs were brand new and works like a charm.

HOLY CRAP! UNBELIEVABLY GOOD! AWESOMELY FANTASTIC! EPIC DRAMA! CLEARLY THE GREATEST MYSTERY SHOW EVER TO BE PRODUCED! THIS SEASON WAS SO AMAZING THAT I THINK I WILL CLAIM IT AS MY "CURRENTLY" FAVORITE SEASON!!
good series, liked it a lot, good read and its enjoyable and nice. highly would suggest that you read these books

My biggest issue with the subbed version of this series by funimation is that the title song is a few seconds off from the original. It's fine in the dubbed version, which is really weird. Also I really hate the dub. It sounds phoned in with no real emotion to it. However, I really love this series. It's fun and engaging, and the story stays interesting.

I started watching the first three with my family using Netflix when it was still streaming DVDs. It's a shame the rest don't seem to be getting a dub or a subtitled version but there are a lot of them, and I'm sure they get pretty similar later on.

This is a excellent anime series for those who like mystery and detective series.  With the main character (Conan) being an up and coming great detective, yet forced to live in a young boy's body after he was forced to take some terrible new and experimental pill, the series becomes quite intriguing as the boy must now gather the clues and solve the crime in different ways since no one would likely believe a little kid.  Each episode is just so fun to watch as Conan somehow manages to gather all the clues, solve the crime, and bring the criminals to justice using several different methods.  It is also aways fun to try and figure out who committed the crime before Conan does.  Season 4 is just as great as the previous with many new and intriguing cases to solve.  It is not too violent, and it still has all of the wonderful pieces to a great mystery/detective series.
People just don't know what they're missing here!!  Think Scooby-Doo for adults, and you'll have SOME slight inkling as to how awesome this friggin show is.
item came on time in excellent condition great service hope I can do business with this seller again highly recommended!
This is one of my favorite show, & I am a big fan of Japanese Anime. . . I also like the mystery in them. I plan to get all english dub Case Closed Movies that are available.
